segments.text: I see the boy standing on that stool, and it’s making me so nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching for cookies, and the stool is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, and she doesn’t even realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to turn around any second and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading across the floor, and no one is paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will fall before the woman even notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting more and more, and it’s terrifying to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, completely unaware of what’s about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t get hurt when that stool finally tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen, and I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR
